{mr.tai-pan.jr} malaysia 2k17 - res ipsa loquitur (part 1)why are we still harping on 1mdb?writing for the malaysian insight, jahabar sadiq asked a simple question that deserves an appropriate answer: why does parti pribumi bersatu malaysia (bersatu) harp on 1mdb, when the 2,881 respondents in an internal poll have stated that their number one concern is the increasing cost of living? first of all, bersatu is not the only party "harping" on 1mdb. tuan ibrahim of pas has raised the issue. dap has, of course, highlighted it the most through tony pua. but, as the author correctly noted, even anwar ibrahim had raised it in 2010, before the job was taken over by rafizi ramli in pkr. in other words, all parties are raising the issue and this includes, first and foremost, some members of umno.  dr mahathir mohamad, muhyiddin yassin and mukhriz mahathir had all raised within the internal structure of the party. but to no avail. thus, bersatu was formed to check the rot in umno and the stain that the latter has left on the honour and dignity of the malays. secondly, the gargantuan size of the issue does not allow one to remain impervious to it. the author said that the average or rural voters cannot compute or comprehend anything in the billions of ringgit. dr mahathir has raised the same point too. but he has not given up, precisely because the voters fail to understand. it was now his duty to make them see the gravity of the situation.the job of exposing systemic and scurrilous corruption cannot be left solely to the countries that are investigating the financial malfeasance. as the author may note, there are six (or more) ongoing investigations into 1mdb. if this issue had been left to the device of "outsiders” only, wherein the pride of malaysians? in fact, the whole of the country would stand accused of being cavalier with high larceny.  thirdly, the malaysian insider then, has gained a strong following by exposing 1mdb almost on a daily basis in 2015. it didn't seem to lose any readers and followers. in fact, it is on this basis that it was probably bought over by the edge, before it reincarnated as the malaysian insight. has the new online portal dropped 1mdb? no. it can't. precisely because this is an issue of serious national importance, with grave ramifications. if 1mbd does not rationalise its debts – and it doesn't seem like it can – malaysian taxpayers would be looking at paying picking up the tab of rm43 billion or more. granted that no one in malaysia has been held criminally responsible, it is all the more vital to focus on the 1mdb issue. perhaps the presentation to the people needs to be simplified given the complexity of 1mdb story involving a web of extra-territorial and international financial and non-financial institutions. perhaps some phd candidate in the field of finance, financial crime or even strategy should take up a research on this web of deceitful financial interplay. fourth, since when is the focus on 1mdb  a zero sum game? by latching onto 1mdb, since when did bersatu forgo other issues? it didn't, and it won’t. in fact, in the history of all political parties in malaysia, none has resorted to using focus groups and opinion surveys right from the very inception of the party to understand the "voice of the people."bersatu has done just that. it has canvassed the views of thousands of voters in order to warn umno of its egregious violation of the fiduciary and financial rights of the malaysian taxpayers. that shows bersatu is truly a people’s movement that has evolved into a political party with very specific aims and objectives as enshrined in its constitution.

{mr.tai-pan.jr} malaysia 2k17 - res ipsa loquitur (part 2)why are we still harping on 1mdb?fifth, granted that the financial malfeasance of 1mdb is due to the financial ineptness of the malaysian prime minister cum financial minister, indeed, cum public official as alleged, isn't it only apt to hold him to account, as he has failed in all three portfolios, as alleged? as the prime minister, his dereliction of duties, as alleged, suggests a sheer indifference to corruption that had affected the entire fifth and fourth floor of his office, if not umno in its entirety. as the sitting finance minister, some rm44 billion or more is allegedly now the debt of malaysia's sovereign fund that is 1mdb. if khazanah, the sovereign fund of malaysia, had mismanaged the funds, wouldn't heads be rolling now? yes, they would. but in the case of 1mdb, there has been zero culpability and accountability. instead those who had wanted to initiate investigations into 1mdb had been either sacked, transferred or, in one case, even transferred to the prime minister’s office. done with such arrogated impunity. last but not least, the debt of 1mdb could have been used to build basic amenities for the poor and under privileged people in malaysia, without reference to race, creed and colour. yet, instead of using the money to defray the economic pain and burden of the average malaysian, the us department of justice investigations alone show that they splurged – yes, splurged – on art pieces, paintings, obscene movies, fancy condominiums in new york and elsewhere. if this is not conspicuous corruption and money laundering, both of which impact the living standards of the average malaysian, what is? a media portal like the malaysian insight can serve malaysia by focusing on, among others, issues of corruption, malfeasance, abuse of power, and grand larceny. it does itself a disservice by resorting to telling bersatu – and by logical extension, other parties – to drop the issues from their agenda and re-education campaign. if anything, the malaysian insight should ask if there is anything it can do to help the malaysian voters, both rural and urban, to understand the severity of the 1mdb problem. it is important that the rural voters, and that includes the felda settlers, be told of what is happening in 1mdb in a simplified manner. telling them about the islamic medium term notes that 1mdb had issued may not be the way to do it. bersatu is willing to convene a cross party dialogue, with the malaysian insight in attendance, on why this issue can and will break umno-led barisan national (bn). perhaps the author is right in suggesting that the average voter cannot comprehend the magnitude and scale of the alleged state-sponsored heist when it crosses the billion ringgit threshold, but the ongoing explanation cannot just stop. in fact, as the survey has showed, many of them are not sure about or do not understand the 1mdb issues. it is incumbent upon us, all parties and the media, to explain the issues in a more simplified way, as dr mahathir,  muhyddin and mukhriz have done after the survey.   the education system in malaysia, weak as it is, still teaches students to differentiate between thousands and millions. all the students need to do to undestand is to break the figures up decimally. thus, rm44 billion would be 440 times of rm100 million; or 4,400 times of 10 million; or 44,000 times of one million; 440,000 times of 100,000; or 4,400,000 of 10,000; or 44,000,000 of 1,000. whichever the permutation, the malaysian prime minister doesn't care. had he done so, he would have spent the money in any one of the combination above in building better schools, hospitals, and universities. this 1mdb debacle is actually a huge "corruption tax" that the people need to bear, through no fault of theirs except in voting for barisan nasional. – may 11, 2017.  dr rais hussin mohamed ariff is a bersatu supreme council member and  the bersatu policy and strategy bureau head.

{zalman a} datuk,the recent developments in 1mdb.the singapore papers report an ongoing settlement.however, everything goes back to the ecrl deal with china.the leaked term sheet of the ercl contract reveals this.total cccc cost of acquiring all remaining parts of 1mdb and its worthless companies and fund units: usd7.5bn or myr30 bn. term sheet, china’s obligations:(a) end july, cccc assumes usd4.78 bn of 1mdb (i.e. 1mdb energy) debt to ipic, due between oct 2016 and 2022.(b) pay on 1mdb’s behalf usd850 mn to ipic;(c) buys at usd315 mn, two jho low-affiliated companies, loh corporation berhad and putra perdana berhad.(d) acquisition of 1mdb ayer hitam (penang land, at usd850 mn, payment to ipic);(e) acquisition of 1mdb global inv. (usd940 mn);(f) acquisition of 1mdb brazen sky (usd1.56 bn); and,(g) acquisition of 100% of 1mdb energy holdings [price (a) = usd4.78 bn]the cccc calculation is the near exact sum in 1mdb total losses (money ‘unverified’), estimated by the auditor general as well as others.doubling the rail contract price returns, by back looping, the cost of bailout from cccc to malaysia so that, on the surface, najib razak is seen to have not only resolved the 1mdb scam but also without incurring a sen. this deal wipes clean the slate at 1mdb, completely — with ipic especially, and with 1mdb energy (which underwrote the usd bonds along with ipic); selling one of the last two pieces of land, ayer hitam; and by transferring ownership out of brazen sky, 1mdb global investments, putra perdana and others. it means china picks up all their liabilities, along with all of 1mdb’s criminal past and any asset issued in its name but frozen in the us and elsewhere.loh corporation berhad and putra perdana berhad have nothing to do with us.they are jho low owned companies.hence not only is the malaysian taxpayer paying double the oost of the ecrl, we are also clearing jho low's business debts.is this legal?of course not.in fact it should (in a civilized country) enhance datuk seri i mappadulung daeng mattimung karaeng sandrobone sultan abdul jalil's jail term.if the malays were less corrupt then mappadulung would have been in jail years ago.

transparency international malaysia (ti-m) notes with concern the defence minister, datuk seri hishammuddin hussein’s statement that corruption and leakages are among the causes of continued intrusions in the 1,400km coastal areas of sabah under the eastern sabah security command (esscom). ti-m supports the defence minister in calling for an urgent need to address these weaknesses after reviewing esscom’s...macam dia pon mengaku....lagi pulak, amalan2 korup lazim belaku di kebanyakkan bahagian donia : "the arms trade is one of the most corrupt prone sectors.  the impact of corruption in the arms trade has severe consequences for citizens, governments and nations.the payment of kickbacks and bribes in defence purchases inflate the cost of weapons and this impedes the ability of governments to defend their countries. when there is high level of secrecy in arms deals, weapons may end up in the hands of criminals and violent dictators ending in the cost of many lives...."(2011, ibid.). ringkaihnya ni cenderong belaku guna hujjah, antaranya:a. para pentingnya petahanan kpd sesatu negara, maka wajag la belanja besag.b. kenunnya mesti kena tinggi unsog rahsia...atau hampa tak payah tau kerana kami lebih tau, macam depa boh tentera malaya di saudi.lepaih tu, buat lagi jawatan, dan bagi kak sepupu pulak tu, mad bin saleh kata, juruih kepada "concentration of power". depa tak sedag ka, nespotisme satu bentuk selingkohan...? bulih ka depa hujjah dzoruroh ka pada hai masih ramai yg berbakat dan bekelayakkan.macam mana pon terima kasih banyak kadiag, alhamdulillah, allah s.w.t. bagi keberanian dan kekuatan kak hang buat blog ni, lantaran tu bulih la aku tumpang jadi tetamu buat coretan, dan mintak maghap la kalu kurang 'decorum' yg selayaknya sebagai sesorang tetamu atau apa2 salah silap, no. wa sallam.aku.

{zalman a} 128 - bn seat forecast. at best, that is the ruling barisan nasional coalition’s best forecast of seats it can win if the general election is called any time soon. the 14th general election must be held by august 24, 2018. at worst, bn can win 122 seats, according to an internal analysis that was tabled at two retreats held in february and before parliament met in march.both numbers are enough for bn to retain putrajaya but many in the coalition are now trying to work out better numbers, as both forecasts are lower than the 132 seats it currently holds.a breakdown of the forecasts show bn is still confident of winning 50 federal seats in its “bank deposit” states of sabah and sarawak. it now holds 46 out of the 56 federal seats in both borneo states.the malaysian insight understands the numbers were crunched with data that included feedback about hot-button issues, such as the ruu355 shariah law amendments and the current bearish economic conditions.datuk,the ph people are also talented at projections.hope they are working hard.i expect mo1 to react soon.

{johan} (1) prime minister abdullah's july 20 revelation of secret meetings between his ruling united malay national organization (umno) and malaysian islamic party (pas) beginning shortly after the march 2008 general election sent shock waves through both political coalitions and unsettled pas itself. starting with state-level talks in selangor, pas president hadi awang and deputy president nasharuddin proceeded with the umno discussions without the knowledge of most party leaders and without formal party endorsement, according to pas officials opposed to the dialogue...kept in the dark about these meetings, nik aziz.......reportedly was incensed with party leaders involved in the secret negotiations when information on the talks came to light. he described any form of cooperation with umno as "sleeping with the enemy"........' (2) former pas vice-president husam musa has alleged that party president abdul hadi awang had tried to form a unity government with umno in selangor. although the salor assemblyperson, who still remains in pas, did not disclose the time frame, it is believed he was referring to the period when former mb khalid ibrahim was removed last year (2014). husam said hadi admitted to this move (having pas and umno form a government in selangor). “our president has admitted that he had offered two or three pkr assemblypersons to join pas to form a state government in selangor with umno."

{hikayat antara dua bandar} hutang negara atau external debt telah berada pada paras 908.7 billion menurut data bank negara. dah nak dekat 1 trilion. zaman mahathir hutang negara pada paras 100 billion plus-plus. zaman pak lah 300 billion. dalam masa 7 tahun sahaja sejak 2009, hutang negara naik mendadak sehingga ke paras 908 billion. negara kecil seperti malaysia yang rakyatnya hanya 30 juta, pendatang bangladesh 5 juta boleh berhutang hampir mencecah 1 trilion. banyaknya negara sekarang berhutang. kutip cukai gst 40 bilion setahun pun masih tak cukup lagi. berbilion-bilion penjimatan duit kerajaan akibat pemansuhan subsidi barang keperluan asas pun masih tak cukup. potong biasiswa dan pembiayaan pendidikan, potong peruntukan dan bajet sana-sini pun masih tak cukup. siapa yang akan tanggung semua hutang-hutang ni? kita semualah siapa lagi. takkan orang yang buat tahi hutang tu tak bayar. dia dengan family dia sah-sahlah tak bayar. rakyat negara ni lah nanti yang akan tanggung. bila kita mati, anak kita pula yang akan tanggung. lepas tu pas kat anak kepada anak kita kalau tak habis lagi bayar.zaman sekarang kalau berlaku kenaikan harga barang, tak ada naik sikit-sikit. sekali naik kaw-kaw naik. tengoklah di sekeliling kita sekarang. kenaikan harga barang. mana ada naik sikit-sikit. semua naik harga melampau-melampau. ikan kembung ikan yang rakyat marhaen selalu makan sekarang dah 20 ringgit sekilo. gula dulu harganya seringgit lebih, la ni dah nak dekat 3 ringgit sekilogram. minyak masak, beras, tepung, barang-barang keperluan asas pengguna di malaysia semuanya harga dah makin naik. minyak petrol satu lagi. harga minyak mentah di pasaran dunia sekarang secara puratanya dah murah. sekitar 45 dollar setong macam tu tapi harga minyak di pam-pam minyak tak reflect harga minyak mentah yang semakin murah di pasaran dunia. harga petrol di pam-pam sekarang harganya seolah-olah seperti harga minyak mentah dunia berada pada paras  70 atau 80 dollar setong. bila ditanya kenapa jadi macam tu, jawapannya oh tu harga minyak yang belum ditapis. kalau dah ditapis harganya akan naik. habis tu zaman mahathir dan pak lah dulu rakyat isi minyak kereta guna minyak mentah yang belum ditapis ke? pasal zaman mereka harga petrol di pam-pam minyak reflect harga minyak mentah di pasaran dunia. kalau naik harga di pasaran dunia maka naiklah harga petrol di pam-pam. begitulah juga sebaliknya. cuma zaman mahathir lain sedikit. rakyat tak terbeban dengan perubahan harga minyak dunia pasal ada pemberian subsidi. bila adanya subsidi, rakyat membayar minyak petrol pada harga yang murah sedikit. la ni asal bagi ucapan bukan main lagi mengungkit. kerajaan terpaksa kutip cukai gst kerana kerajaan terpaksa membelanjakan around 24 bilion untuk kemudahan kesihatan rakyat dengan pulangan semula kepada kerajaan yang tidak seberapa. zaman dia jer ke rakyat pergi hospital free. dulu pergi hospital kena bayar ke? kerajaan dulu tak mengungkit-ngungkit pun berbelanja untuk kemudahan kesihatan rakyat, kerajaan sekarang mengungkit-ngungkit pulak. if you care so much about the balance sheet then don't be in the government in the first place. go into business. rakyat zaman sekarang paling banyak menyumbang duit kepada kerajaan melalui cukai gst, boleh pulak dia mengungkit-ngungkit bila duit tu digunakan untuk kebajikan rakyat. ada kementerian perdagangan dalam negeri kepenggunaan pun seolah-olah macam tak ada fungsi. kerja apa yang mereka buat pun tak tahu sampai kehidupan pengguna sekarang macam cacing kepanasan. duk seronok makan gaji saja. tak buat apa-apa kerja.

{zalman a} kuala lumpur, march 20 — nik mohamad abduh nik abdul aziz said he is not offended nor feeling dejected after he was trounced by incumbent dr izani husin for the pengkalan chepa pas division deputy chief post.the pas youth chief and son of the late party spiritual leader datuk nik abdul aziz nik mat said winning or losing an election was just part of an exercise.“[if i had] won, [i would be] happy, [but i have] lost [so i am] happier,” he told sinar online.“istiqamah, contesting is normal, [it is] just an exercise,” he added, using the arabic term which means to “stay steadfast”.nik abduh also told the news portal that it was a “norm”, when asked if the defeat meant the party’s grassroots had rejected him.the pasir mas mp only received 37 votes for the post compared to dr izani, who bagged 209 votes. the division chief post was retained by kelantan deputy mentri besar datuk mohd amar nik abdullah.nik abduh had previously stated that he would not fight to keep his pas youth chief post, after a landslide victory in the party’s muktamar, or annual congress, in 2015.datuk,it seems that he "umno hijau" faction of pas has lost favour with the grassroots.hope that tuan ibrahim will make the move to challenge hadi also.unless of course, pas wants to be known as the pro-rasuah, pro-corruption, pro-klepet "islamic party".that is up to them.

" nazri aziz bukan budak najib" ..nazri aziz menteri umno pertama calon kan mukhriz untuk jawatan naib president umno"jika nazri aziz budak najib..sudah tentu dia calon hishamuddin...nazri aziz...adalah nazri aziz...yang dia takut hanyalah  allah...belum ada menteri umno bagi semua gaji kepada anak anak petani di selatan thai..one  n only nazri aziz..ini dia nazri aziz...yang saya tahu dan saya hormat dia..sebab dia hormat saya...salam tokhebat nya nazri aziznota.serahkan jawatan ketua pemuda kepada rahim tamby chik singapore tunduk berikan bus express malaysia mengambil penumpang di singapore sekolah ugama di selatan  thai biaya penuh dengan hasil rezeki beliaucalonkan mukriz mahathir ..jawatan naib president umnopertahankan mahtahir semasa anwar lawan mahathirpergi kenduri nurul izah anak anwar semasa anwar dalam jail..hanya menteri umno yang berani datang kenduri wan azizah pada masa itu..pertahankan pak lahpertahankan najib..pertahankan zahid mahathir sendiri berhutang maruah dengan nazri aziz... (itu mahathir tahu kisah nya)

{mappadulung mentimun penyamun} "jadi kita janganlah berharap banyak sangat daripada bahas itu sebab nazri memang tak mampu jawab apa yang akan dr mahathir bangkitkan kecuali secara loyar buruk.dia tidak ada locus standi (kedudukan) dan tak cukup daulat untuk berbahas dengan dr mahathir."memang si nazri ni akan buat loyar burok dia nanti. confirm. kena adakan lintas langsung dan rakaman unt merakam aksi badut ni nanti.

{lee watt} this is what the useless party of bersatu is limited to: wanting to debate this and that. and then trying to convince people the 'won'. but what can we really expect of bersatu except for childish stunts like this. desperately trying to remain in the public's eyes but with no real substance. only mahathir's cronies and losers would take bersatu seriously.next general elections: bersatu totally knocked out. bersatu supporters balik kampung tanam jagung muahaha!

{pengampu nazri aziz} salam dakj....mohon laluan...demi allah.. ???“nazri aziz...adalah nazri aziz...yang dia takut hanyalah allah...”seorang muslim sejati mustahil akan menyokong kezaliman yang nyata...seorang muslim sejati "yang dia takut hanyalah allah" mustahil akan memakai rantai emas...seorang muslim sejati mustahil akan membenarkan kemungkaran..."demi allah.." konon!-------"sabda rasulullah saw... 'manusia munafik' ada 3 ciri2.."-bila ia bercakap... ia bohongi..-bila ia berjanji... ia mungkiri..-bila ia beramanah... ia khianati..nazri aziz = najib = manipulator + populist + pretender

{pemerhati} bro,takat tu saja kah jasa si nazri sejak masuk politik umno ? tu pun 95% bodek presiden untuk jaga kedudukan dia dalam umno.2% pasal bas ekspress.2% pasal tahfiz kat pattani1% pasal pi kenduri wan azizah.baik bagi kat komè saja jadi ketua bahagian.

{jumbeaux} salamdi dalam kelucuan kita mengenai debat jadi tak jadi nazri aziz, saya ingin berkongsi sedikit pemerhatian saya tentang sidang parlimen yang berlangsung sekarang.amat menyedihkan bagi saya bila tiada kedengaran suara-suara nasionalis melayu di perdebatan kali ini.di mana soalan-soalan mengenai penjualan kedaulatan negara yang sedang berlaku di zaman najib? forest city, malacca gateway, bandar malaysia, ecrl,  proton, fgv dan lain-lain. ahli parlimen umno nampaknya sudah terlalu kenyang untuk bangkit bertanya.pkr, dap pula lebih menumpukan perhatian dari segi kesalahan urus tadbir negara.pas dengan mimpi hududnya.di manakah pembela kedaulatan negara dan  nasib orang melayu?saya harap ppbm masib berani untuk  memainkan peranan ini walaupun sudah bersama pakatan harapan.

{sukasamasuka} datuk.offtrack again...i'm sorry, datuk."bersatu youth chief mulls giving up politics for oxford...parti pribumi bersatu malaysia (bersatu) youth chief syed saddiq syed abdul rahman is mulling to quit active politics and accept an offer to further his studies at oxford university...doing masters degree in public policy."source: http://www.malaysiakini.com/news/376589go 'my son'...and, congratulation to you!learn british politics by joining either the conservatives or the labour party...and  see the world...and experience it yourself personally...there is nothing like it.please avoid umno uk, pas and many other stupid religious movements in the uk...they offer you nothing.this is the best time to learn british politics with brexit and all...you will be in the thick of it...first hand experience so to speak...which money cannot buy that, 'my son'.the future of malaysia is with young and bright people like you who are well-educated from the finest institution of learning in the world...oxford is the best.learn and bring back the knowledge so we can be a proud nation once again.aku doakan kamu, syed saddiq moga2an berjaya!jadi la kamu anak yang baik...kerana keturunan kamu memang keturunan yang baik...rajin dan jujur la...dan ikut cakap orang tua kamu...dan, seboleh2nya elakkan 4 perkara saja yakni gila wang (rasuah), gila perempuan, gila 'judi' dan gila 'arak'.

{sukasamasuka} datuk."kalau tak silap, asal-usul bahas itu bermula apabila nazri cabar dr mahathir tanding lawan beliau dalam pilihan raya umum akan datang di padang rengas."dengar2 debat ini kena tunda hingga ke 7hb april yang akan diadakan di shah alam, ibukota padang rengas.berani nya si nazri bawa tun berdebat di kampung halaman sendiri...itu baru la anak lelaki...konfirm kau ni "chief" la.

{zed-85} sallam dato’kelebihan yang ada pada bn adalah ianya dapat mengawal maklumat dalam media arus perdana seperti suratkhabar dan tv.debat secara terbuka, sudah tentu tidak menguntungkan bn kerana susah untuk mengawal maklumat daripada pembangkang yang dibenarkan bercakap.kalau di indonesia, debat antara jokowi dan lawannya untuk jawatan presiden disiarkan di dalam tv arus perdana. begitu juga di singapura, debat antara pembangkan dan pemerintah disiarkan di tv.di malaysia, janganlah kita hendak harapkan sangat perkara ini berlaku.saya lebih utamakan berita ppbm masuk ke dalam pakatan harapan dan langkah berikutnya untuk adakan satu logo untuk pakatan. ini yang akan menguatkan lagi pembangkang dan berikan impak besar kepada malaysia.

{zalman a} from zam:pakatan harapan akan lebih meyakinkan jika kabinet bayangannya membariskan mukhriz mahathir ,azmin ali, rafizi ramle (pkr), tony pua,dan husam.menonjolkan kepimpinan  muda sebagai kabinet bayangan pakatan harapan  akan memberikan impak yang sangat besar untuk meyakinkan rakyat  bahawa pilihanraya ke 14 tidak sekadarkan untuk gulingkan najib tetapi juga untuk menggantikan pimpinan yang lapuk.mahathir juga sewajarnya bertanding dalam pilihanraya 14 walaupun beliau tidak mahu menjadi perdana menteri. nyanyuk hanyalah gelaran yang diberikan oleh orang tidak siuman kepadanya  tetapi fikirannya lebih progresif dan dinamik dari najib atau pondan padang rengas.orang terus tidak jemu untuk mendengarnya walaupun sudah lebih 20 tahun beliau bersuara dibandingkan dengan fikiran datuk seri najib yang tidak pernah dikagumi dan tidak membuka fikiran rakyat.http://zamkata.blogspot.my/search/label/utamadatuk,the function of a shadow cabinet is to attack the relevant minister on various policies within each ministry.it is, in fact, a good idea.the only problem i see is that ph have not nominated a pm candidate.someone must be the "face" for voters.it cannot be wan azizah.this must be settled by april to give enough "exposure" to the shadow cabinet and pm in waiting.

{zalman a} in the meantime, it is 100% certain that pas & pkr are heading for divorce.ph must tell the rakyat that "umno hijau" has only the sole aim of letting umno win.a vote for pas is a vote for umno.very simple.

{zalman a} the same warning was issued by pas research centre director mohd zuhdi marzuki, who according to utusan malaysia, threatened to “take back” the seats that the islamist party “lent” to pkr in the last general election.zuhdi was reported as saying this could happen if pas decided to cut ties with pkr in the former’s forthcoming muktamar.he said pas had a strategy to take over selangor, even if azmin didn’t believe it was possible.“we do not rule out the possibility of taking back all the seats in selangor, including pkr seats. for now we still have ties with pkr and we will wait for the decision (to be made during the muktamar).“if we cut ties (with pkr), we will take back all the seats, not only in selangor, but in the country,” he added.datuk,mohd zuhdi marzuki, who is more umno than umno themselves, has let the open secret out.the "strategy" (as in sg besar) is to split votes to help umno win.you can be sure that umno merah and umno hijau (pas) have already discussed nationwide how to split the votes. they will not compete against each other in some seats.hadi is a good man,he only wants to rule 5 states.umno will give him perak and selangor.
selasa tak tiba tapi ramai kawan najib-rosmah tanggung bala

{sukasamasuka} datuk.datuk.tn50 ialah temberang najib ada 50 dalil...temberang najib no.1...kota baru, march 12, 2017 — malaysia will become weak and non-competitive if the country is led by leaders without a vision, said prime minister datuk seri najib razak.“i always remember what imam al-ghazali had said, “if you want to see the future generation, look at the current generation. therefore, our children need education, knowledge and competitive edge. that is why we started the national transformation 2050 (tn50) dialogue,” he said."source:http://www.themalaymailonline.com/malaysia/article/leaders-without-vision-will-hamper-progress-of-country-pm-saystemberang najib no.2 - he failed vision 2020.temberang najib no.3 - pada 5 julai 2015, akhbar the star dan stesen tv astro awani melaporkan yang perdana menteri (datuk seri i mappadulung daeng mattimung karaeng sandrobone sultan abdul jalil) mohd najib abdul razak akan kemukakan saman terhadap surat khabar amerika wall street journal (wsj) pada hari selasa 7 julai 2015. temberang najib no.4 - hakikatnya sampai hari ini najib tak saman dan tak mungkin dia berani saman pasal sejak itu bukti penipuan 1mdb makin banyak.

{sukasamasuka} datuk."tim leissner inilah yang pada tahun 2012 atur hutang as$6.5 bilion (kira-kira rm20 bilion pada kadar tukaran waktu itu) untuk 1mdb. yang jadi kontroversi ialah goldman sachs dibayar komisen dan duit poket as$593 juta (rm1.8 bilion). pada tahun berikutnya (2013), kira-kira as$680 juta masuk akaun peribadi najib di ambank."1. oooo...begini rupa2nya kerja 'kawan najib-rosmah'...yang sekarang ini sudah 'tanggung bala' akibat muslihat anak2 haramzadah itu la.2. goldman sachs?...aku dengar orang bilang itu bank yahudi, ada kaitan dengan geng zionis di israel...isisis...dapat komisen sampai 10%??...rm1.6 billion???....weeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeewwww!3. orang bilang kalau komisyen sudah 10%...agak2nya la berapa la 'discount rate' bond 1mdb itu ya?4. nampak2nya mampus la 1mdb nak bayar komisyen dan bunga sebanyak rm20 billion itu.5. aku dengar hutang rm20 billion itu untuk project hartanah trx.6. kalau tak silap, harga tanah untuk trx itu tabung haji sudah kautim habis, jadi itu duit rm20 billion agak2nya untuk start the project la ya.7. rm20 billion itu akan memberi peluang pekerjaan sebanyak 400,000 orang la mcm project lebuhraya pan borneo?...itu najib yang kata, bukan aku.8. cuba datuk jalan2 makan angin ke tapak project trx itu...aku rasa mesti sibuk la macam kotaraya kota kinabalu!9. oooooi mesti best la trx ini, nanti aku mau turun kl la cari kerja...sini sudah susah jual mee goreng, mau try disitu pula10. nazri bolih hentam tun di padang rengas dengan kejayaan besar umno tentang trx ini.atau...mungkin ini salah satu temberang najib?

{sukasamasuka} datuk."abdul rahman ini orang sabah kepercayaan najib. pengarah strategik barisan nasional."1. itu la dia anak jati sabah.2. kau bolih ganti si musa aman tu bos ku after pru14...sudah itu kerusi tunggu kau...konfirm 100%.3. mati la si keruak makan pasir, tiada sudah chance dia mau jadi ketua menteri sabah kalau begini.4. nazri..when you make a remark that you are not like rahman...do you know who is your enemy now?5. he is the future chief minister of sabah.6. do you think najib love you more than him?7. nazri...mulut kau celupar...cakap macam orang gila...orang sabah masih ingat dengan apa yang kau cakap tentang sabah dalam kes penculikan tempoh hari.8. nazri, si rahman tu akan bawa 25 kerusi parlimen dan 73 kerusi adun untuk si najib...kau bawa berapa?...satu pun belum tau lagi.9. kau fikir najib dengar cakap kau ka nazri atau si rahman?10. nazri...you are just a "doberman" to all the prime ministers...but, even a dog has a dignity.

{sukasamasuka} datuk." src ini milik kementerian kewangan dan pinjam rm4 bilion daripada kumpulan wang amanah pencen (kwap) kononnya untuk melabur di mongolia negara altantuya."1. ini pun temberang najib 50 juga.2. apandi kata...ini bukan datuk yang kata...najib tidak tau yang duit rm42 juta dalam akaun peribadi nya itu dari src....cheeeeeee, pandai kan dia...3. apandi kata najib fikir itu duit sebahagian daripada saki baki rm2.6 billion derma arab yang sudah dipulangkan...itu apandi yang kata, tetapi itu najib yang kata...nasib juga ada si apandi pandai cover...good job apandi!tunggu dulu apandi...wait..4. tapi kalau aku tak silap, src dapat pinjaman rm4 billion dari kwap pada tahun 2011...kononnya untuk gali kubur arang batu di mongolia...hehehehe...5.tunggu apandi...sabar...tiba2 pula src dipindah ke kementerian kewangan pada 2012.6. dan seterusnya, pada dec 26, 2014, tiba2 rm32 juta pula masuk dalam akaun peribadi si najib diambank...dan yang bakinya rm10 juta itu pula pada feb 10, 2015...semuanya rm42 juta, datuk!jadi kalau datuk pun bolih lupa...atau sengaja lupa bukan rm24 juta tetapi rm42 juta...apa lagi si najib yang sibuk sebagai menteri kewangan.7. sejak bila kita melabur di mongolia?...tetapi, yang penting kenapa kita melabur disana?8. duit pencen kerajaan sebanyak rm4 billion ini digunakan macam social corporate responsibility untuk src pula...atau pr...atau rasuah...supaya orang2 di mongolia duduk diam2 jangan bising.9. csr ini biasanya untuk company2 gergasi yang macam nestle, coca cola, sime darby dsbnya...bukan mainan untuk company besar macam taik hidung seperti src.10. aku dengar akaun src tak ada pun pasal korek arang batu tetapi untuk "open ended funds, quoted shares, bonds and time deposits"....hingga sekarang tiada siapa pun tau apa sudah jadi dengan duit pencen rm4 billion ini!betul la mo1 anak haramzadah!kerajaan umno sial!

{sukasamasuka} datuk.1. tun tau setiap rm1 billion pelaburan akan menjana sekurang2nya nya 2,000 pekerjaan secara kasar...paling sikit 1,500 pekerjaan...dari si tukang pungut sampah dan cuci tandas sampai la peluang jadi manager manager.2. najib pula bilang masa dia di sindumin, sabah waktu lancarkan itu projek lebuhraya pan borneo...project yang menelan belanja rm16 billion itu..kalau ada duit la...akan menjana 400,000 pekerjaan di sabah!3. kita tau stail najib kerja macam orang gila babi, jadi temberang dia di sabah tidak bolih la dipakai...kecuali, orang itu pun gila babi macam najib juga.4. tetapi, si nazri ni pun kalau cakap memang macam gila babi juga, jadi tun kena awas sikit masa di padang rengas nanti.5. silap hari bulan, si nazri akan buat kenyataan bahawa hutang rm42 billion 1mdb itu akan...atau sudah menjana 1,050,000 peluang pekerjaan!6. tun kena lawat tapak project trx...dan bandar malaysia...betul ka ada 1,050,000 pekerja disitu?7. tapi jangan hairan pula kalau nazri bawa satu juta pelancong2 melawat tapak project untuk bergambar...sebab dia ni bukan saja gila babi, tetapi mungkin sudah gila macam bos dia.8. salah satu symptom penyakit gila babi, ialah bulu babi runtuh hingga jadi botak...kawan cina yang cakap, bukan aku.9. jadi bila babi sudah gila, cara kawalnya ialah dengan guna rantai ikat dileher babi.10. itu la sebabnya lelaki islam yang pakai rantai emas macam gila babi!

{zalman a} "pas has warned that it will sever ties with parti pribumi bersatu malaysia (bersatu) if it joins pakatan harapan.according to pas deputy president mohd amar nik abdullah, pas would cease negotiations with bersatu if this happens."if that is the official stand of bersatu, then it (our ties) is cut... no need for more negotiations. we (pas) will walk alone."we will also no longer share a stage with bersatu any further, as that was the condition that we have set before," he was quoted as saying by berita harian in kota baru.mohd amar was responding to bersatu chairperson dr mahathir mohamad who yesterday confirmed that his party had agreed in principle to join harapan."datuk.the drama never ends with pas.the umno hijau part of pas cannot be trusted.they are still in selangor govt with both pkr and dap so they also have zero logic.they can become a distraction if allowed to flip-flop all the time.tun was right to set a deadline.this will just go on forever, otherwise.

{b} to ans all those accusations might be tough. but as long as dis world turning n spinning, some fuzzy n sometime dizzy responds might be fitting all in some kind a bend yoyo for laugh. c how aunt rossy, must be in her good sense of mind, dismissed allegation of misappropriating permata funning.....by offering her handbag to be checked.if u get bored with ur routine try to be amused by many of them on other sites. this same witty comment by lee watt on d previous page is quite amusing too....d bend tat any other bender can do:very weak argument and justification here in supporting mahathir. these are what the bersatu people having been harping for months. but they have worn thin. just look at the very weak support for the party.mahathir saving malaysia?! you are obviously smoking the same stuff as kadir. can give me a bit or not? haha! the fact is, most of the problems we are facing now are because of mahathir. including corruption and money politics. this is the person bersatu is trying to convince us all to call the shots again? sorry lah!1mdb.... most people are tired of bersatu and pakatan trying to whip a dead horse. it is not proven najib had stolen anything from 1mdb. only allegation by the opposition using articles in the foreign media as 'evidence'. they can con those who are stupid and emotional. but not those who look at facts.this is the reality: most people don't have much trust in bersatu, pakatan and mahathir. for very good reasons.

{zalman a} petaling jaya: parti pribumi bersatu malaysia (ppbm) mendakwa pas sengaja mencari alasan untuk tidak menyertai gabungan pembangkang melawan barisan nasional (bn).ketua penerangan datuk kamarudin md nor berkata pas sebenarnya sudah mengetahui lebih awal tentang hasrat ppbm membawa mereka menyertai gabungan untuk pilihan raya umum akan datang.“pas pun sudah tahu,,,jadi tidak menjadi suatu yang baru,” katanya kepada fmt. “ini sengaja nak jadikan alasan saja. di ppbm kita tidak ada masalah.”beliau menjawab kenyataan presiden pas datuk seri abdul hadi awang hari ini, yang berkata rundingan kerjasama politik antara kedua-dua parti berakhir apabila pengerusi ppbm tun dr mahathir mohamad umum menyertai ph.menurut hadi, keputusan diambil kerana pas tidak mahu bekerjasama dengan parti yang ada kaitan dengan dap dan amanah.“pas pilih tak kerjasama itu nasib dia,” kata kamarudin. “sambutan terhadap ppbm dan parti pembangkang yang bersama ph juga luar biasa.” ini semua petanda rakyaat sedia ubah kerajaan.”datuk,hadi is very kind.he says he will only take selangor, perak, kelantan, terengganu and kedah for pas.umno can have the rest.i wonder if hadi is rooted in reality.nik abduh was thrashed in pengkalan chepa division voting.does the "umno hijau" branch of pas have as much traction as they think they do?we shall see.in the meantime we await the ru355 sandiwara in parliament, when hadi's master mo1 also waits to "tumpang glamer".the malays must be told to see through the hypocrisy.

{zalman a} if this debate happens between tun and nazri, the msm will spin it either way as a victory for nazri.some ground rules should be applied:a) there should be equal supporters for each side. otherwise the biadap members of umno youth will be used to disrupt the proceedings so the tv cameras can show them.b) questions from the floor can be asked, but equally too. let us see if nazri can cope with a rafizi or a pua. he cannot.nazri's defences will be very predictable but are easy to wash away.

{zalman a} seberang perai: kubu kuat datuk seri anwar ibrahim nampaknya tersedia untuk pertembungan antara pas dan pkr selepas parti islam memutuskan semua kerjasama dengan parti reformasi di kawasan parlimen permatang pauh.yang dipertua pas kawasan omar hassan hari ini mendakwa pkr cuba menjejaskan kedudukan pas dalam kalangan pengundi melayu-islam di sana menjelang pilihan raya umum ke-14 (pru-14).beliau juga mendakwa pkr tidak menghormati pas sebagai rakan kerjasama kerana mereka mengekalkan kerjasama dengan dap dan parti amanah negara untuk menyerang mereka.“pkr didapati sewenang-wenangnya menggunakan sebilangan ahli pas untuk kepentingan politik pkr tanpa perbincangan terlebih dahulu dengan pas,” katanya dalam kenyataan hari ini.lebih memudaratkan apabila ahli pas mengadu pkr meminta mereka keluar parti bagi tujuan memegang jawatan tertentu dalam kerajaan negeri pakatan harapan, tambahnya.“sifat tidak bertanggungjawab oleh pkr ini menunjukkan pkr sangat tidak menghormati prinsip setiakawan dan boleh menjejaskan pas,” katanya.and so it begins.this is the start of umno hijau's push to return mo1 to power.next month, in april pas will formally talak tiga pkr after the pas assembly.hadi and mo1 have already, no doubt, "divided the map" of the peninsula (pas has zero hope in east malaysia.)hadi is not greedy, he only wants to rule 5 states.that includes selangor and perak.the malays will be very generous to give selangor and perak to hadi, who did a terrible job in terengganu and was kicked out after one term as mb.melayu mudah lupa?

{zalman a} datuk,what happens when a government bill is defeated? for their survival, umno leaders have planned to work with pas without having prior discussions with their allies in bn, throwing itself between the devil and the deep blue sea now.according to a survey, umno's support rate in predominantly malay constituencies has dropped below 40 per cent, and if pas eventually turns to bersatu instead, umno will not only lose the election, but the whole bn administration could be brought down.as such, umno has since three years ago attempted to lure pas into a tie-up, with ruu355 amendment as a bait. what umno failed to anticipate was that other bn components were strongly against the private bill of pas president hadi awang.if the bill could not secure the support of other bn components and opposition parties, the ruu355 amendment bill now taken over by the government will not get adopted in the parliament, and this will be like an indirect vote of no confidence against the current administration.then.....mo1 must resign.

2017 held at a hotel in subang jaya over the weekend.he added however, that the autonomy in education will still be subject to the national curriculum.on the issue of financial commitment to the two {sukasamasuka} datuk." baru-baru ini saya tanya seorang ahli ekonomi dan penyelidik muda yang sedang naik namanya, apakah br1m boleh atasi kesan gst ke atas orang miskin?dia jawab macam ini:"kutipan gst tahun 2016 kira-kira rm39 bilion. bilangan isi rumah di malaysia 6.35 juta. jadi bayaran purata gst setiap isi rumah kira-kira rm6,141 setahun.“ini anggaran kasar sebab perniagaan pun bayar gst. saya tidak tahu peratusan gst yang dibayar oleh pengguna dan perniagaan."1. aku rasa "ahli ekonomi dan penyelidik muda" ni sudah silap la datuk.2. kutipan gst tidak ada kena mengena dengan 6.35 juta isi rumah sebab "isi rumah" atau "rumah kediaman" bukan nya "tax collector".3. premis perniagaan adalah "tax collector" untuk kerajaan, tetapi jumlah kutipan gst pun bukan berdasarkan berapa banyak nya premis perniagaan itu...sebab kutipan gst bergantung pada berapa banyak hasil penjualan dari perniagaan itu...lagi banyak menjual, lagi besar la kutipan gst nya...ini la yang dipanggil "consumption tax".4. jadi, "purata gst setiap isi rumah kira-kira rm6,141 setahun" sudah silap.5. gst di kutip dari setiap orang yang berada di bumi malaysia...termasuk31,700,000 penduduk malaysia,27,000,000 pelancong asing*2,000,000 pandatang tanpa izin, 1,860,000 pekerja asing pegang pas lawatan kerja sementara,jumlah = 62,560,000 ini ada la pembayar gst.*termasuk pelancong asing walaupun mereka mungkin hanya tinggal dalam 1-2 minggu sahaja di malaysia...makanya sukar untuk membuat purata dalam setahun.6. setiap orang dari yang paling miskin tepi jalan raya hingga billionare akan bayar gst yang sama kalau mereka makan sayur kubis.7. gst tidak menjana aktiviti ekonomi baru atau hasil kutipan cukai dari industry baru sebab ia adalah "consumption tax".8. brim menjana "consumption"...dimana penerima2 brim akan belanja beli barang2 seperti pakaian, perkakas dapur dsbnya yang dikenakan gst.9. jadi siapa yang dapat rm1,200,"nilainya" sebenarnya hanya tinggal rm1,128 sebab barang2 yang dia beli semua kena 6% gst.10. pada dasarnya hubungan brim dan gst ini sama la dengan kalau tangan kanan umno hulur rm1 kepada rakyat, tetapi tangan kiri dia sudah ambil rm5.74 dari poket belakang setiap rakyat!(the ratio rm39 billion gst : rm6.8 billion brim)

{zalman a} task force felda (bah 2)peneroka felda, seperti yang saya tulis dahulu, yang berjumlah 112,635 orang, yang mendiami di lebih 300 tanah rancangan, mesti sedar perkara ini. musibah warga felda bukan terhad kepada isiu hutang purata rm120,000/peneroka, atau pertelingkahan kadar perahan atau rungutan bayaran bukan dalam bulan semasa. ini masaalah yang ‘real’ yang dihadapi oleh peneroka setiap hari. masaalah ini rentetan dan akibat dari tamak haloba seorang yang bernama najib tun razak.tapi sengat bisa isu2 ini diringankan sedikit kerana secara umumnya, kehidupan warga felda terlindung. sekurang kurangnya dapat elaun sara hidup dari rm1000-rm1500 sebulan, ada tanah untuk rumah, ada tanah ladang 10 ekar, ada kemudahan awam dan sosial dalam tanah rancangan dan lain. mereka seolah olah nya leka kerana ada jaminan dari kerajaan umno untuk menjaga mereka. dan berserta jamina tersebut, ancaman bahawa jika umno bukan kerajaan, kehidupan selesa peneroka felda akan hilang.namun demikian, untuk jenerasi kedua bagaimana?  mengikut suatu kajian oleh uia, anak peneroka felda yang berjaya menjadi pelajar pusat pengajian tinggi, jadi doctor, lawyer dan graduan2 bidang lain hanya 1.5% sahaja. apa jadi dengan 98.5% lagi?mereka jadi sampah masyarakat, bercandu dan bermadat dan duduk ditanggung ibu bapa dalam tanah rancangan. masa depan mereka bagaimana? sedangkan tanah seluas 360,000 hektar milik felda plantations sudah dipajak kepada fgv dan tidak mungkin dikembalikan. bukan rumah dan perumahan warga felda yang dibina, tapi pengurusan felda membeli hotel dan kondominum. bukan melabur dalam core business, tapi beli business yang bukan2 seperti membuka kedai2 pastry yang rugi dan ditutup, melaksanakan projek membela ikan sturgeon- ikan yang masih jadi bahan dan objek kaji selidik dinegara2 dimana ikan sturgeon itu ikan watan. felda gatal hendak membela sturgeon di sungai pahang di jerantut. akibatnya rugi besar. banyak lagi pelaburan yang mengarut yang dilakukan oleh isa samad dan rakan2.sekarang , sharir samad pula yang dilantik sebagai pengerusi felda. adakah kebaradaan shahrir samad ialah untuk membersihkan kotoran2 najib dalam felda? itu pasal kita hendak lihat dan mentelaah lapuran audit felda untuk tahun 2016, sebelum shahrir ‘cleans up the mess najib caused’. http://sakmongkol.blogspot.my/2017/02/peringatan-lembut-untuk-warga-felda.html

{pena ekonomis} dalam keadaan bank negara yang sedang berusaha sedaya upaya untuk mengukuhkan nilai ringgit yang menjunam ke tahap terendah sejak krisis kewangan 1998, kerajaan mengambil tindakan kurang bijak dengan menambahkan lagi beban ke atas bank negara dengan menubuhkan pasukan siasatan ke atas isu yang telah berlaku lebih 25 tahun dahulu. menteri kewangan yang ada sekarang dah lah langsung tak membantu dalam usaha untuk memulihkan nilai ringgit malah menambahkan lagi beban kepada bank negara yang terpaksa gali fail-fail lama dengan isu lapuk yang  belaku puluhan tahun dahulu yang impak dan kesannya tiada kena mengena dengan kehidupan rakyat jelata sekarang. walaupun bukan satu keperluan pada masa ini, ianya dirasakan satu keperluan untuk menumpulkan serangan bertali arus tun dr. mahathir. pada masa itu, mahathir banyak megambil risiko dan menggunakan banyak cara demi untuk meningkatkan pendapatan dan kekayaan negara. perniagaan forex adalah salah satu caranya dan effort beliau tersebut berakhir dengan kegagalan. cubaan negara berjinak-jinak dengan industri berat melalui biji timah dan besi melalui perwaja steel juga gagal. namun banyak lagi gamble mahathir yang berjaya seperti percubaan negara dalam pelaburan sumber mineral petroleum dan gas secara besar-besaran. percubaan ini berjaya dan petronas adalah bukti kejayaan beliau. petronas kini dikenali sebagai salah satu syarikat multi nasional terulung negara yang dikenali seantero dunia.  berkenaan isu forex ni, ya, negara kerugian besar pada waktu itu tapi tidaklah sampai memeras dan menindas rakyat untuk mendapatkan kembali berpuluh-puluh bilion wang yang telah hilang. mahathir tidak memperkenalkan cukai gst kepada rakyat pada waktu itu untuk menggantikan wang yang telah hilang. mahathir tidak memansuhkan subsidi gula, subsidi beras, subsidi tepung, subsidi minyak masak, subsidi minyak petrol untuk menggantikan wang yang telah hilang. mahathir tidak memotong bajet kementerian kesihatan, kementerian pendidikan dan universiti-universiti awam untuk menggantikan wang yang telah hilang. mahathir tidak mengurangkan wang pinjaman ptptn kepada pelajar miskin untuk menggantikan wang yang telah hilang. mahathir tidak menutup pejabat-pejabat tourism malaysia untuk menggantikan wang yang telah hilang. mahathir juga tidak memotong perbelanjaan penyelenggaraan mesin omr lembaga peperiksaan malaysia untuk menggantikan wang yang hilang. mahathir tidak menaikkan cukai eksais rokok secara membuta-tuli sehingga harga rokok melambung lebih rm 15 sekotak bagi menggantikan wang yang hilang. pada zaman beliau, kenaikkan harga rokok tidak pernah lebih dari 50 sen. kenaikkan pada masa beliau adalah lebih bertujuan untuk mendidik rakyat supaya menjauhi tabiat buruk tersebut, bukannya untuk menambah hasil kerajaan semata-mata. beliau sedar, jika harga rokok dinaikkan secara mendadak, perokok tegar tetap membelinya dan ini akan mengurangkan lagi pendapatan mereka apabila wang banyak dihabiskan untuk membeli rokok yang telah dinaikkan harga. apabila banyak wang dihabiskan untuk membeli rokok yang telah mahal, belanja bulanan mereka bertambah dengan gaji yang tidak naik. ini akan meningkatkan lagi kos sara hidup mereka dan taraf kehidupan mereka akan jatuh secara drastik. kuasa membeli akan berkurangan secara mendadak dan ini akan menambahkan lagi beban kepada rakyat. beliau arif akan semua itu dan oleh sebab itulah cukai dosa (sin tax) tidak boleh dinaikkan sewenang-wenangnya untuk menambah hasil kerajaan. ditambah pula dengan cukai gst dikenakan kepada rakyat pada masa sekarang, bertambah-tambahlah lagi sengsara rakyat. sebab itulah sesuatu dasar atau polisi fiskal yang diambil hendak dikaji dan diperhalusi secara menyeluruh akan impak dan kesannya ke atas kehidupan rakyat dan bukannya dilihat dari sudut hasil atau monetary kepada negara semata-mata.

wajib diamalkan, bukan setakat solat, puasa, haji & zakat sahaja.. sistem islam adalah yang terbaik. since islam the system has long been abandoned, it copuld not work overnight. the implementataion of the system requires comprehensive preparation. the groundworks must be prepared first. there must first be a blueprint of all te sub-systems. as for islam legal system, the law must be codified in teh form of statute & for the islamic penal law there must first be a peanl code, like the one that we have now. after having the blue print in place, the infrastructure must be provided. the infrastructure consists of courts, judges, lawyers, prosecutors, enforcement agency, investigative body & prisons. the system will be improvised over time. decided cases will fill the voids in the statutes and where necessary the statutes will be amended as and when required. having said that, another important component is the sincerity & honesty of the government in implementing the system. it must be driven by religious obligation, not as a tool to win support. islam fails in those countries due to the absence of the elements aforesaid and teh presence of the latter elements, not due to governed or covered by the penal code. you want to incarcerate orang2 tak puasa for a maximum of 30 years, or give them 100 lashes or fine them rm100k? just one example. this is madness. pas people surely are syok sendiri. i just wonder what their lawyers are doing or hadi would not listen to them?with such kind of punishments, what preparation has been done to ensure botched implementation can {zalman a} salam datuk,interesting analysis from fmt:"meanwhile, hadi was absent from the ceremony to send off the humanitarian ship (food flotilla) for the rohingya on feb 3, saying he was in hospital for medical examination.hadi’s refusal to join najib in the event might be meant to deliver a certain message, even though najib was still heard chanting “muslim solidarity” in his speech.as a matter of fact, there is disagreement within pas on whether to work with umno and help it retain the federal administration. while there are chances that umno will help pas push through its hudud agenda, some in the party worry that pas could be washed out altogether in the general election.analysis shows that the support of umno in rural areas has declined to 40%, more than 30% for pas and about 20% for ppbm.hence, a three-cornered fight will only benefit umno at the expense of pas. as such, there are some within pas who feel that the party should instead take advantage of a weakened umno to set its sights on putrajaya.if pas cannot keep kelantan, it will be powerless to implement hudud in the state even if the shariah law amendment is passed in the dewan rakyat.in pas, hadi is seen as more pro-najib while his deputy tuan ibrahim is seen to be taking the opposite position.will umno give up kelantan and terengganu in exchange for pas’ consent to create three-cornered fights in ge14? will all quarters within pas come together and agree on such a tie-up with umno?"i think pas will also ask umno for parts of kedah, too.in exchange, they will act as the "spoiler" in malay areas so that umno can win.i think pas should go back to basics.dealing with the devil is wrong.dealing with the corruot is wrong.dealing with the immoral is wrong.if they help mo1 get five more years of theft, they are only "spoiling" the lives of the rakyat.

{zalman a} agama kita ajar kita supaya bercakap dan menceritakan kebenaran. jangan kita mengelirukan. jangan menyembunyikan kebenaran dengan kepalsuan. perintah ini ada dalam al quran. kepada ilmuwan agama pula, ada perintah khusus kepada mereka jangan menyembunyikan kebenaran apabila fakta ada didepan mata.tapi inilah yang sebenarnya berlaku. usaha menyembunyikan kebenaran, menyibarkan dusta dan propaganda adalah kerja harian pemerintah. berbohong dan berdusta menjadi kebiasaan. lama2 ini akan menjadi sebahagian dari budaya dan adat. maka terkenallah orang melayu yang berugama islam sebagai suatu bangsa yang suka berbohong dan berdusta.pemimpin melayu pula adalah golongan yang tidak boleh dipercayai. dia suka berbohong. dia mencuri wang rakyat. dia salah guna kuasa. dia melampaui kebebasan eksekutif. bagaimana bangsa lain mahu memuliakan bangsa melayu? jeritlah sekuat mana, hunuslah keris panjang pendek. orang akan melihat bangsa melayu sebagai suatu bangsa yang suka menipu. tidak boleh diberi amanah dan percaya. diberi kuasa jadi kaduk nak junjung. mengapa kita berada dalam keadaan penghinaan seperti ini? kerana kita tidak bangkit menolak kerajaan yang dipimpin oleh lanun dan perompak.hidup kita dilaknati oleh tuhan.bagaiman bangsa seperti ini mahu menegakkan dan mempromosi wasathiyah? bagaimana mahu jadi model kepada bangsa lain bila syarat2 yang boleh dimuliakan tidak ada pada bangsa melayu dan pemimpin2 nya?sebahagian besar orang melayu yang agama nya juga islam, tidak kisah akan perbuatan mungkar ini. kepercayaan kepada ketuanan melayu membuat orang melayu merasakan mereka boleh lakukan apa sahaja. pemimpin kecil umno di dalam daerah kecil, yang merasakan diri mereka napoleon2 kecil,  tidak akan faham mengapa masyarakat umum tidak mahu tunduk kepada mereka.perkerjaan tidak bermoral tidak jadi isu sebab ketuanan melayu boleh mengabsahkan segala nya. kerana mereka menegakkan ketuanan melayu yakni tanggapan bahawa oleh kerana kuasa ada dalam tangan orang melayu, mereka ialah tuan, manakala majority kita adalah hamba. tuan2 melayu ini mahukan keadaan begini dikekalkan. tuan2 melayu tidak adalah keseronokan yang paling mereka suka melainkan memerintah orang lain menghamba-abdikan diri kepada mereka. mereka mahu kesenangan tapi kesenanagan itu diusahakan oleh orang lain. mereka mahukan kemuliaan seolah olah nya kemuliaan lahir bersama nya dari perut ibu mereka.

{zalman a} sebahagian orang melayu bercakap besar sahaja. seperti budak2 umno yang berpendidikan rendah, ada jawatan sedikit dalam umno bahagian, berlagak macam orang lain terhutang hidup kepada mereka. sebetulnya mereka tidak ada apa2 diantara dua telinga mereka.sekarang apabila pegangan lapuk ini, yakni ketuanan melayu sudah tidak mendapat tempat, umno menggunakan ketuanan islam pula untuk kekal berkuasa. ketuanan islam ini lebih sukar untuk disanggah kerana mereka akan kata kita anti agama dan tidak taat kepada ulil amri. ilmuwan agama yang digaji oleh pemerintah umno akan keluarkan ayat dan fatwa untuk terus memanjarai minda orang melayu.tapi lihatlah kemunafikan mereka. dalam negeri yang diperintah bn, rakyat mesti taat kepada ulil amri; tapi dalam negeri yang diperintah oleh bukan bn, tidak mengapa menjatuhkan kerajaan dan pemerintah. mengapa tidak ada keseragaman? tidak boleh dalam negeri a, maka tidaklah bleh juga dalam negeri b.itulah tanggapan mereka yang berkuasa. mereka ingat jika mereka bertopengkan ugama, orang tidak berani menegur. tapi agama juga memerintah kita jangan melindungi kejahatan. ugama islam kata jika tuhan tidak mengujudkan suatu golongan untuk menyekat suatu golongan yang lain, maka hancurlah muka bumi ini. ertinya, agama islam itu memerintah umat nya sentiasa periksa dan imbang. agama islam memerintah supaya muncul suatu golongan yang mengajak orang melakukan kebaikan dan menolak kemungkaran. jika orang ilmuwan agama itu sendiri yang mempromosi kemungkaran, mereka juga itu kita tolak.ertinya nya apa? ertinya, kemungkaran yang berselindung dan bersembunyikan dan bertopengkan agama pun tidak selamat dari diserang oleh kebenaran. http://sakmongkol.blogspot.my/2017/02/politik-sebahagian-orang-melayu.html

{senjakala} bermula disember 2014, menteri kpdnkk pada waktu itu dato' hasan malik berkata malaysia akan guna pakai sistem apungan terkawal dalam menentukan harga minyak yang digunakan oleh rakyat setiap bulan. sistem apungan terkawal ini adalah berdasarkan harga minyak mentah di pasaran dunia. kalau naik harga di pasaran antarabangsa, maka naiklah harga minyak kita. begitulah juga sebaliknya. tapi bila harga minyak tak naik di pasaran antarabangsa tapi kerajaan naikkan juga harga minyak seperti baru-baru ini, tiba-tiba satu pihak muncul dan berkata oh yang tu harga minyak mentah, harga minyak mentah memang tak naik. rakyat guna minyak yang dah ditapis. minyak yang dah ditapis harga sudah naik, menurut kenyataan yang dikeluarkan oleh pasukan komunikasi strategik bn. ini pasukan komunikasi atrategik bn yang kata, bukan kpdnkk yang kata. sekarang pasukan komunikasi strategik bn bercakap bagi pihak kerajaan, bukan lagi kpdnkk. walaupun tiada fakta, data dan maklumat terkini yang biasanya dikutip dan disimpan oleh pihak kerajaan melalui kpdnkk, pasukan komunikasi strategik bn nampaknya lebih tahu dan lebih arif dari kpdnkk hinggal boleh mengeluarkan kenyataan bagi pihak kerajaan. dan rakyat diluar sana diminta untuk lebih percaya maklumat seperti ini daripada maklumat yang dikeluarkan oleh agensi kerajaan yang lain. sekian dimaklumkan.

{zalman a} "ppbm is caught between pas and pakatan harapan parties dap and amanah, with the islamist party insisting that suitors must not be partnered with either of its former ally from the defunct pakatan rakyat as well as its splinter party.pas and ppbm earlier this week formed a joint committee that was tasked with framing an outline for political cooperation between both parties ahead of the 14th general election that must be called by mid next year.dap has also sought to re-engage with the islamist party despite the open hostility between the two stemming from their unresolved argument over pas’s push to expand islamic penal laws, but the latter remains adamant that it will not renew ties with the secular party.opposition parties continue to stress the importance of avoiding overlaps in the general election that would split their support base to the advantage of barisan nasional under the country’s first-past-the-post voting system, but continued acrimony involving dap, pas and amanah has made this virtually unavoidable."datuk,the pas dark side will mount a counerattack under umno orders.there are pas leaders who report directly to umno.so again, the hurdle is easy:either "in" or "out".if the pas dark side prevails, then there just needs to be a focused effort with what remains.let the rakyat curse pas for keeping corruption alive, because that is what they will do.

{kak midah shopping ke nz} it is a good effort to work those numbers but it is only indicative of malaysians level of affordability. but the point remains that government have done away with the policy of keeping salary and wages low to get investment from abroad, while government subsidise to keep cost of living low. progress have brought about a higher standard of living, at least in the urban areas before it trickles down to the rural areas and finally to inland of sabah and sarawak.it was not sustainable during the end of mahathir era. factories began to move away to lower cost countries. he was already talking about it and the knowledge economy together with the need for an industral masterplan to move up the learning curve. these are languages to admit that low cost producer economic model was not beginning to work.to move to a higher added value economy and knowledge economy, country has to attract high value brains. salary and wages have to be allowed to find its true level. its the very reason government have moved in sync with market pressure to pursue high income economic model. mahathir has no problem with that. he agreed as long as there is an increase in productivity i.s. higher output per input. it also means prices will have to find its equilibrium of supply meets demand level. there are two problems. malaysian retail and wholesale industry is monopolises by a certain clan of race for each economic activity. there is collussion and price fixing. market entry is controlled by these business syndicate. so prices of goods are kept higher everytime govt announce increase in salary and wages of govt servants. i know akj is talking about oil but i am trying to discuss from the angle of affordability..another problem is malaysian entrepreneurs are still stuck in old school ways of keeping salary and wages low and not invest in machinisation and automation. to address that, they rely on imported labours. they are still not looking at their business from the way mahathir believe it should be and i.e. increase productivity. however these problems are mere transitionary. market and government must ensure fair business practiises to enable prices and s&w find its true and proper level. aand monopoly together with leakage in the system imust be plugged and lawfully addressed.its easy to talk and visualise a developed nation status. put a target date and list the aspirations. question is how do you get there. the bigger hurdle is the growing pains and political opportunism/resentment to progress that has to be faced.

{zalman a} bekas senator umno datuk mohd ezam mohd nor menyelar pemuda umno kerana cuba untuk membawa agenda bodoh dengan menuntut penubuhan sebua suruhajaya siasata diraja berhubung skandal bmf dan kerugian pertukaran asing bank negara exhange asing (forex).katanya, kisah lampau 30 tahun itu tidak akan membantu memulihkan keyakinan terhadap kerajaan sedia ada di negara ini.“keyakinan dunia kepada negara ini tidak akan kembali dengan teriakan kisah 30 tahun lalu.“keyakinan dunia hanya akan kembali dengan tindakan kerajaan hari ini terhadap jenayah hari ini, kata ezam selaku pengerusi hisbah centre for reform dalam satu kenyataan hari ini.menceritakan kisah bmf dan kemelut pertukaran asing bank negara, katanya terdapat tangkapan serta hukuman berhubung kes bmf, manakala ada yang hilang jawatan berikutan kerugian di bank pusat itu.“kertas putih (juga) dibentang dan dibahas di parlimen.“tindakan mungkin tidak sempurna dan betul semuanya tetapi pokoknya dunia tidak hilang keyakinan kepada malaysia masa itu seperti hari ini kerana mereka lihat ada tindakan diambil,” katanya.sebaliknya, berbeza dengan skandal 1mdb, ezam berkata, pemuda umno perlu bertanya mengapa tidak ada tindakan terhadap beberapa individu yang dikaitkan seperti jutawan jho low syang namanya disebut dalam prosiding mahkamah dan siasatan di luar negara.“pemuda umno sepatutnya tanya perdana menteri (datuk seri najib razak) hari ini mana jho low, bekas (ceo 1mdb datuk) shahrol (azral ibrahim halmi), (bekas pengarah urusan src international) nik faisal (ariff nik kamil), dan (anak tiri, najib) – riza aziz?

{kamil tajuddin} ahli majlis tertinggi ppbm dan ahli bisness yang gagal a kadir jasin merumuskan bahawa harga petrol di negara kita mahal.dia membuat rumusan tersebut kerana dia kata "mahal murah sesuatu barang bukan pada harganya, tapi kemampuan pengguna. kemampuan pengguna pula bergantung kepada pendapatan."kadir jasin pula membandingkan harga petrol malaysia dengan pendapatan penduduk di negara kaya."pendapatan per kapita nominal singapura 4.9 kali lebih tinggi daripada malaysia, tapi harga minyak di singapura hanya 2.82 kali lebih tinggi daripada di malaysia.pendapatan per kapita nominal rakyat australia 4.7 kali lebih tinggi daripada malaysia, tapi harga minyak di australia hanya 1.62 kali ganda lebih mahal daripada malaysia."tetapi peliknya kadir jasin tidak pula membuat perbandingan dengan negara lain seperti thailand dan indonesia di mana harga petrol mereka jauh lebih tinggi walaupun pendaptan per kapita nominalnya lebih rendah berbanding malaysia.walau apapun, penjelesan kadir jasin senang difahami. oleh itu, kita gunakan cara kadir jasin untuk membuat perbandingan harga petrol dan kemampuan rakyat dengan zaman mahathir.pendapatan per kapita nominal rakyat malaysia tahun 2017 ialah as$10,878  dan harga minyak dalam dolar amerika yang perlu dibayar, as$0.51 seliter.pendapatan per kapita nominal rakyat malaysia tahun 1990 ialah as$2,417 dan harga minyak dalam dolar amerika pada masa itu as$0.42 seliter.pendapatan per kapita nominal rakyat malaysia tahun 2003 pula ialah as$4,427 dan harga minyak dalam dolar amerika pada masa itu as$0.34 seliter.maksudnya, pendapatan per kapita nominal rakyat tahun 2017 ialah 3.5 kali lebih tinggi berbanding tahun 1990, tapi harga minyak hari ini hanya 0.2 kali lebih tinggi.pendapatan per kapita nominal rakyat tahun 2017 ialah 1.56.kali lebih tinggi berbanding tahun 1990, tapi harga minyak hari ini hanya 0.48 kali lebih tinggi.tambahan pula, petrol tahun 2017 yang merupakan ron95 lebih tinggi mutu berbanding petrol ron92 zaman mahathir.ini jelas menunjukkan harga petrol zaman mahathir jauh lebih mahal dan membebankan rakyat malaysia.ini ialah kerana selama 22 tahun mahathir memimpin, walaupun harga minyak dunia murah dan dia tidak memberi apa-apa subsidi tetapi memungut cukai 58.62 setiap liter diatas petrol pula.terima kasih a kadir jasin kerana jelas membuktikan harga petrol zaman mahathir mahal, kejam dan membebankan rakyat. tetapi peliknya ialah pada masa itu, kadir jasin tidak pernah mengutuk mahathir.hari ini, harga petrol di malaysia adalah ke-17 termurah antara 193 negara didunia tetapi pihak pembangkan tidak pula menyebut hal ini tetapi asyik mengunakan isu ini untuk mengutuk kerajaan kerana kehabisan modal dan akal.lebih-lebih lagi, harga petrol sekarang jauh {sukasamasuka} datuk.sabah dap wants autonomy to go beyond ma63fmt reporters...january 31, 2017.the malaysia agreement 1963 (ma63) is the bottomline, not the final objective, as it is no longer about just not taking orders from putrajaya.petaling jaya: sabah dap says the state can be only less dependent on the federal government if the federal constitution was amended, the daily express reported today.citing the malaysia agreement 1963 (ma63), the party said it is the basis but not the “final objective” for the future of sabah.“the state assembly must be enpowered. there must be total reconsideration of sabah’s place in the federation.“the ma63 is the bottomline, but not the final objective. it’s no longer about just not taking orders from malaya. there must be real autonomy,” the party said in a statement released today.in a memorandum submitted to the sabah rights review committee hearing at the state assembly last week, sabah dap said it is not in favour of discussions within the straightjacket of the federal constitution and/or the malaysia agreement 1963 (ma63).the party also called for the 9th schedule of the federal constitution to be amended to transfer jurisdiction from the federal to the state and/or concurrent list.“this is necessary for devolution of administrative powers from the federal to the sabah government.”the party also demanded for a higher share of the national revenue and for such an arrangement to be institutionalised as it would avoid a situation where the federal government can victimise the state government.it noted that sabah had gone from being among the richest states in the federaton to the poorest.“income in the state is among the most unevenly distributed. it’s plagued by illegal immigrants and there are constant threats to security,” the dap said in its memorandum.the statement added that the new “federalism” proposed will strengthen sabah’s role and dignity as an equal partner in malaysia.“it will also allow sabah to play a greater role in shaping its own as well as national policies,” sabah dap said, comparing their approach with that of the sarawak government’s to devolution in the run-up to the state election last year.such arrangements as in sarawak are severely limited in scope and effect, it said.“the arrangements would always depend on the goodwill and cooperation of the federal government,” sabah dap said.sabah dap also feels that sarawak’s approach on devolution was also not permanent or secure and could be revoked by the federal government at any time.source: http://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/nation/2017/01/31/sabah-dap-wants-autonomy-to-go-beyond-ma63/dap has been very consistent on this issue...and, the only national party really care about malaysia agreement 1963...kudos to you sir, mr. lim kit siang...thank you sir.

setelah dedak sudah tidak diberi. cuba tanya pula berapa kekayaan yang beliau pungut waktu menjadi penulis upahan umno suatu ketika dahulu.tulisan beliau mengenai politik kelantan pun agak pelik, mana peranan dr mahathir sewaktu krisis politik di kelantan. mungkin datuk mustafa ali boleh memberi jawapannya, kerana beliau antara tokoh yang masih hidup, ketika pas bersama bn dan terlibat secara langsung dalam krisis tersebut. apakah datuk lupa bahawa dr mahathir merupakan timbalan perdana menteri dan timbalan presiden umno. samada datuk lupa atau buat-buat lupa. datuk hanya sebut tokoh-tokoh yang sudah meninggal seperti tun hussein onn, jaafar albar, datuk harun idris tetapi datuk sepatah pun tidak sebut nama tun dr mahathir. mungkin terlalu banyak makan sagon atau dedak kot.tulisan datuk yang penuh perajudis kepada pas, membangkitkan isu rm90 juta. sebagai seorang penulis yang hebat, kenalah baca dulu media rasmi pas mengenai status saman pas terhadap sarawak report. mungkin itu budaya penulisan datuk sewaktu makan dedak dengan umno sehingga terbawa-bawa perangai tersebut walau pun tidak bersama umno.tidak perlulah membuat tuduhan bahawa pas bersama umno. datuk belajarlah menjadi pembangkang setelah kenyang bersama umno. pas sudah 65 tahun faham sepak terajang umno. banyak di kalangan kami tidak pernah bersama umno. sedangkan datuk dan sekutu dan sewaktu dengannya pernah terlibat dengan umno. kami lawan umno sewaktu datuk pertahan umno melalui serangan media. janganlah datuk hendak samakan kami dengan perangai datuk.maaflah saya tidak suka serang datuk, kerana datuk baru hendak belajar bertateh menjadi pembangkang. tetapi apabila datuk membuat tuduhan yang melampau kepada pas, saya terpaksa serang. sewaktu datuk dengan umno pun kami lawan umno, inikan pula datuk pun tidak ada kuasa tidak munasabah kami tidak berani lawan datuk. datuk tidak layak bercakap soal integriti, nanti banyak pula orang akan dedahkan sewaktu datuk menyokong umno dahulu.

parties were preoccupied with about 28 chinese and non-muslim majority seats.  “if they can’t agree among themselves, they will field their own candidates, as what we saw in the 2013 general election {zalman a} "barisan nasional (bn) winning a two-thirds majority in parliament and pas losing all their parliamentary seats is a possibility in the 14th general election, according to a preliminary survey by the invoke centre for policy initiatives (i-cpi).in several simulation exercises carried out by i-cpi for three-cornered fights, it found that bn could win 168 federal seats while pakatan harapan (and parti pribumi bersatu malaysia) take 54 seats, leaving pas with nothing.but this scenario was contingent on several factors: if those who did not vote in the 13th general election continued abstaining from voting and that chinese voter support for all parties remained at the same level as during last year’s sungai besar and kuala kangsar by-elections.another scenario i-cpi found was that bn could win ge14 with 130 seats, while pakatan harapan and ppbm win 92 seats, leaving pas with zero seats as well. this is possible if fence-sitters continued to abstain from voting and if chinese voters continued the same voting pattern as ge13.“in a three-cornered contest, pas is likely to lose all of its existing parliamentary and state seats,” invoke strategic director shaun kua said during a closed-door briefing on the preliminary survey results last night.in the last general election, bn won 133 out of the 222 parliamentary seats.another simulation also found that pakatan harapan and ppbm could win the next general election with a simple majority (126 seats) provided that half of those who did not vote in the previous election supported them, and if chinese voter support for the opposition coalition remained the same as ge13.another precondition is that pakatan harapan must also be able win over at least 38 per cent of pas supporters nationwide.out of the 104,340 people it polled, 41 per cent said they would vote for bn, nearly a quarter or 24 per cent said they would vote for pakatan harapan while 21 per cent said they would vote for pas in the event of a three-cornered fight.a total of 14 per cent said they would abstain from voting." datuk,before any "scenario" can happen i think a manifesto and unity must be seen.even a pm candidate, yes.disunity does not get votes.pas is in or out.clarity is the key.

{keluarga felda dari seberang.} salam dakj:minggu lalu saya diundang resmi oleh yayasan perdana utk jumpa tun mahathir,maka terbanglah sy ke tanahair.2jam lebih sy luahkan hati sy pada tun m sebagai rakyat malaysia diperantau yg tidak mahu lihat tanahair diporak perandakan.kami hanya berdua kerna tun tidak mahu ada org lain diperbincangan dari'hati ke hati'tersebut.setelah pertemuan saya terbang kembali ke negara yg saya bermastautin sekian lama.di pesawat saya melihat kebawah tanah tumpah darah saya.air mata saya mengalir teringat wajah tua yg baru saya berjumpa dan wajah keibuan tun hasmah masuk utk menemani tun m makan siang setelah perjumpaan saya dgn tun.setelah pesawat saya mendarat di negara saya tinggal,ini kata hati saya'jika saya boleh jadi sebahagian dari yg pertahankan bumi yg saya tinggal sekarang,kerana istri dan anak2 sy warga negara,negara yg saya duduki sekarang.dan pertubuhan kami di minta bersama utk mengawal sempadan perairan negara yg sy bermastautin oleh pihak kerajaan mereka,dan kami berjuang utk pihak asing tidak campurtangan dlm pentadbiran keselamatan negara'wahai anak bangsa bumi ibu pertiwi(malaysia),jadilah saperti kami.dan saya akan tiupkan semangat 'bela negara'tercinta dari kejauhan.salam hormat tanahairku malaysia.

{zalman a} "parti harapan rakyat (harapan) sabah president lajim ukin has dismissed a claim by parti warisan sabah (warisan) that it can rule sabah alone, the daily express reported today.“it’s irrational and nonsensical. no party can govern the state alone or win the general election without the help of other parties,” lajim told the daily, in reference to a statement on sunday by warisan president shafie apdal that his party “can stand alone to run the state”.he chided the former umno minister for thinking that warisan was already strong enough to wrest the state from the barisan nasional (bn) on their own.lajim then pointed out that even bn in sabah needs so many component parties to win elections, naming umno, pbs, upko, pbrs and ldp cooperating to win the elections and run the state.he called for cooperation among parties in sabah which have the same objectives as harapan, that is toppling umno/bn and ensuring sabah are accorded its rights under the malaysia agreement 1963 (ma63).lajim reckons that shafie may have strong support in the east coast of sabah, but the same cannot be said in the west coast, in the upper interior and lower interior and the north.“outside the east coast, warisan needs to work with other parties,” he was quoted as saying by daily express.calling for a straight fight between the opposition and bn, lajim said, any three or four-cornered fight would only see the people of sabah being divided too.“it’s imperative that not only the people of sabah but also opposition parties be united in facing umno/bn,” he said.“harapan will work with opposition parties in sabah to take on umno/bn.”datuk,the facts don;t support these statements:a) oppo can beat bn even if pas becomes spoiler. not true, nationally. 3-corner fights will be fatal.b) warisan can win sabah alone.beware the disease of ego.be aware of mo1's desperation.unity or failure is the choice.
